name: tmux-cheatsheet
title: Tmux Cheatsheet
description: Provides easy acess to tmux cheatsheet documentation for when you forget a command, or are just learning.
author: alikhatibak

commands.name: tmux-cheatsheet
commands.title: Search Tmux Commands
commands.description: Search for tmux commands, shortcuts, and descriptions.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
